name: Trader Simulator 2022 (Trijam#163)
description:
Left Arrow : Buy 

Right Arrow : Sell

TRIJAM#163 : Buy & Sell

The goal is to expand your purse. You start the run with 400gold.

Every offer, you have to choose if you buy (with left arrow), sell (with right arrow) or do nothing with the proposed resources.

Try to have a bigger amount of money at the end of 30th Trade than at the beggining. 

beware! At the end of the game, unsold ressources are lost and won't provide you any extra money.

 Take care of the price evolution and the quantity of the resources during the translation to maximize your profit and become the richest merchant of the world of Trader Simulator !!

Done in 3h for core gameplay & asset. And a few hours for the music, balancing gameplay, menuing,etc...
